name: rship
description: Ecosystem for building isomorphic web applications

scripts.code:coverage: istanbul cover ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha mocha ./cli/**/*.spec.js && npm run code:report
scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:build && cd _book && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'Update docs' && git checkout -b gh-pages && git add . && git commit -am 'Update docs' && git push git@github.com:rambler-digital-solutions/rship.git gh-pages --force
